content: I’ve always used a travel site (usually WebJet, being relatively popular here in Australia) to find the provider with the lowest price, and then make the booking via the provider’s own site rather than through the travel site to avoid paying the travel site’s commission (WebJet seems to take $10-$20 for domestic flights) and get any perks like rewards points. I honestly thought this is how everyone does it, who actually books through the travel sites?
